name: Little Monki
description:
Little Monki

Little Monki is a cute and relaxing sokoban-like game, help the little monkey to collect all the bananas to satisfy his hungry.

How to Play:

Mobs can be beaten only when awaken:




Up: W / ⬆ / D-Pad
Down: S / ⬇ / D-Pad
Left: A / ⬅ / D-Pad
Right: D / ➡ / D-Pad
Bomb: L / Space-Bar / Face-Buttons
Menu: Esc / Left-Bumper
Reset: R / Right-Bumper

This Game Includes:


● 100 Levels (5 worlds, each one has 20 levels)
● 100 Achievements
● Controller Support
● 6 Good Game Music
